resources.string: Depending on the functionality of your bank account you will verify by logging into your online banking or by taking a selfie and scanning your ID/Passport.
Please provide your bank account IBAN and we will check the best option for you.
DEXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XX

Unfortunately we were not able to successfully process the payment initiation. Please try again. Make sure that you have sufficient funds on your account and access to the second factor of your bank (e.g. pushTAN, photoTAN, etc.).
Continue to sign documents to finish your identification process.
